events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the laptop screen has multiple dead pixels and scratches, making it unusable.
The issue has been identified as a product defect due to reported damage and faulty screen display.
Assigning support agent specialized in handling defective product cases to assist the customer promptly.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I understand the problem with your laptop screen and I’m here to help.
Could you please send us photos of the damaged screen and confirm if you still have the original packaging?
I have attached clear pictures showing the scratches and dead pixels, and I still have the packaging intact.
We can offer you a replacement laptop or a full refund once the faulty product is returned. Please let us know your preference.
I would prefer a replacement laptop as soon as possible since I need to use it for work urgently.
Your request for a replacement has been processed. We will ship the new laptop within two business days at no extra cost.
Just checking in to confirm you have received the replacement laptop and that everything is working perfectly.
Yes, the replacement arrived today and it’s in perfect condition. Thank you very much for your prompt support!
We have sent you a short satisfaction survey to gather your feedback about our support service and resolution.
I have completed the survey and rated the support experience as excellent due to the fast and helpful responses.
We are closing this case as the issue has been fully resolved and the customer is satisfied with the replacement.
This case has been archived as part of routine data management after resolution and closure confirmation.
